Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are experiencing delays. Expect longer than usual wait times.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are experiencing delays. Expect longer than usual wait times.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

 Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Jackson
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Jackson due to a sick employee. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Jackson due to a sick employee.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
